pullRequest.title: Balder/add noexcept to move constructors and operators

commit.message: Add move constructor and operator to string
Add noexcept to move constructors and operators

nodes.bodyText: assign-style functions are less commonly noexcept since it's expected that the underlying allocation may throw. Since we're running under vespamalloc this shouldn't be a problem (process gets killed instead, which is much easier to reason about), but just a general observation.
Could consider factoring out the shared code between the move ctor and move assignment operator into a separate function

commit.message: Factor out common code and add more sanity checking to the tests.
